1 PRINT CHR$(147)
2 PRINT "CONFIGURE CHARSET"
3 GOSUB 10000

10 PRINT CHR$(160);:PRINT CHR$(161)
20 PRINT CHR$(162);:PRINT CHR$(163)

10000 FOR I=0 TO 26: READ X: POKE 828+I,X: NEXT I
10001 DATA 169,000,160,208,133,095,132,096
10002 DATA 169,000,160,224,133,090,132,091
10003 DATA 169,000,160,064,133,088,132,089
10004 DATA 076,191,163
10005 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) AND 254
10006 POKE 1,PEEK(1) AND 251
10007 SYS 828
10008 POKE 1,PEEK(1) OR 4
10009 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) OR 1
10010 POKE 53272,PEEK(53272) AND 240 OR 12
10011 FOR A=12800 TO 12831: READ ZE: POKE A,ZE: NEXT A
10012 DATA 000,000,003,003,003,003,063,063
10013 DATA 000,000,192,192,192,192,252,252
10014 DATA 063,063,003,003,003,003,000,000
10015 DATA 252,252,192,192,192,192,000,000
10037 RETURN
